about_the_game:
Days Of Haze is a puzzle filled climate simulated action RPG where your actions affect the weather and temperature.
Coated in the exakt NES palette. Every enemy killed, every life tree planted, and every seed sown plus every quest undertaken will dynamically affect how much disease is in the air, how the climate system evolves, and ultimately, the fate of the planet. This will, in turn, influence how fast things grow and have a bearing on the survival of the people living on the planet. You have never played an rpg like this before.


You are a boy shielded from everything by your grandfather. Now he is gone and you have to decide if you dare to enter the big world.
Explore a world in decline. Fight the planet's elements. Get diseases and cure diseases and hopefully make the whole world easier to explore and help the people that are left.
Unravel the mystery of the Red Goo and its effect on the world. Why did the Protectors disappear and is there a conspiracy or not?

Do your best to survive but remember, you have to live too. If some days you feel you don't want to challenge the elements and put your life at risk.
Go play arcade games in the bars in towns and collect capsules or take care of your strong willed animals and DAX.



  • Unique advanced affectable weather and temperature system

  • Exploration of a big world filled with mystery and stories.

  • Deep leveling and development system, think about the path you take in life

  • Dungeons and grottos filled with secrets and puzzles and lore.

  • Survive the affectable climate and the world by equipping the right gear, eating and sleeping.

  • Live your life too you only have one! Do honest work some days and spend the money on multiple fully fledged arcade games and capsule toys and other fun stuff.

  • One of a kind farm animal breeding and emotion system, breed them to get better offspring but beware they have their own personality and goals in life.

  • Varied enviroments to explore with different climate zones that bring unique sets of challenges to overcome.

  • Magical soundtrack by Filip Holmberg, Gottfrid Wännberg and Tomas Nygren that you can enjoy while you explore.

short_description: Incredibly unique loot and puzzle filled action RPG where you affect the climate. Loot, survive, craft, breed wildlife, defeat bosses, and equip gear. Every enemy killed, tree planted, every seed sown and every quest will dynamically affect how the climate system evolves and number of diseases.
